headline: Why Micron Stock Is Soaring Today
summary: Micron TechnologyÂ (NASDAQ: MU) stock is posting big gains Thursday amid a positive indicator for its industry and bullish momentum for the broader market.  The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite were up 1.9% and 2.6%, respectively.  Micron's valuation is jumping today after fellow memory-chip player SK Hynix posted strong first-quarter results driven by artificial intelligence (AI) tailwinds.
